title: Personality And Well-Being
teaser: Chances are, you probably know if youâ€™re extroverted or introverted. But what about other key personality traits, like your agreeableness, or your level of neuroticism? John Munson talks to the author of a new book about the building blocks of our dispositions, and how they can set us up for happiness, misery, or even poor health.
